title: 146: A Defense of Christmas
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Josh Gibbs, a favorite of ours, just put out a new book containing essays on Christmas. We discuss them here. Because Christmas is awesome, and you should awesome too.
itunes:author: A butcher, a baker, and a candlestick maker
itunes:subtitle: Our podcast has always been one of resistance.
